sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ShoppingCartIcon, ChartBarIcon, ClipboardDocumentListIcon, CubeIcon, TruckIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon, DocumentTextIcon, ChartPieIcon, CalendarIcon, ClockIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const FnbDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Chicken Burger', category: 'Burgers', price: 12.99, stock: 25, supplier: 'Fresh Foods Ltd' }, { id: 2, name: 'Caesar Salad', category: 'Salads', price: 8.99, stock: 15, supplier: 'Green Valley' }, { id: 3, name: 'Pasta Carbonara', category: 'Pasta', price: 14.99, stock: 8, supplier: 'Italian Imports' }, { id: 4, name: 'Fish & Chips', category: 'Seafood', price: 16.99, stock: 12, supplier: 'Ocean Fresh' }, { id: 5, name: 'Chocolate Cake', category: 'Desserts', price: 6.99, stock: 3, supplier: 'Sweet Dreams' } ]; const recentOrders = [ { id: 'ORD-001', customer: 'John Doe', items: 3, total: 45.97, status: 'Processing', time: '2:30 PM' }, { id: 'ORD-002', customer: 'Jane Smith', items: 2, total: 25.98, status: 'Completed', time: '2:15 PM' }, { id: 'ORD-003', customer: 'Mike Johnson', items: 4, total: 67.96, status: 'Pending', time: '2:45 PM' } ]; const lowStockItems = menuItems.filter(item => item.stock < 10); const stats = { todayRevenue: 1250.50, todayOrders: 45, lowStockCount: lowStockItems.length, pendingOrders: recentOrders.filter(order => order.status === 'Pending').length }; const renderOverview = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Today's Revenue

${stats.todayRevenue}

Today's Orders

{stats.todayOrders}

Low Stock Items

{stats.lowStockCount}

Pending Orders

{stats.pendingOrders}

{/* Recent Orders */}

Recent Orders

{recentOrders.map((order) => (

{order.id}

{order.customer}

{order.items} items ${order.total}
{order.status} {order.time}
))}
{/* Low Stock Alert */} {lowStockItems.length > 0 && (

Low Stock Alert

{lowStockItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.category}

Only {item.stock} left

Supplier: {item.supplier}

))}
)}
); const renderMenuManagement = () => (

Menu Management

Menu Items

{menuItems.map((item) => ( ))}
Item Category Price Stock Supplier Actions
{item.name}
 {item.category} ${item.price} {item.stock} {item.supplier}
); const renderOrderManagement = () => (

Order Management

{/* Active Orders */}

Active Orders

{recentOrders.map((order) => (

{order.id}

{order.customer}

{order.status}
{order.items} items ${order.total}
))}
{/* Order Statistics */}

Order Statistics

Total Orders Today {stats.todayOrders}
Revenue Today ${stats.todayRevenue}
Average Order Value ${(stats.todayRevenue / stats.todayOrders).toFixed(2)}
Pending Orders {stats.pendingOrders}
); const renderReports = () => (

Reports & Analytics

{/* Revenue Chart Placeholder */}

Revenue Trend

Chart will be implemented here

{/* Top Selling Items */}

Top Selling Items

{menuItems.slice(0, 5).map((item, index) => (
#{index + 1} {item.name}
{Math.floor(Math.random() * 50) + 10} sold
))}
{/* Expense Logging */}

Expense Logging

Today's Expenses

$245.50

This Week

$1,250.75

This Month

$5,420.25

); const tabs = [ { id: 'overview', name: 'Overview', icon: ChartBarIcon }, { id: 'menu', name: 'Menu & Inventory', icon: ClipboardDocumentListIcon }, { id: 'orders', name: 'Order Management', icon: ShoppingCartIcon }, { id: 'reports', name: 'Reports', icon: ChartPieIcon } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

FNB Manager Portal

Food & Beverage Management System

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Tab Content */} {activeTab === 'overview' && renderOverview()} {activeTab === 'menu' && renderMenuManagement()} {activeTab === 'orders' && renderOrderManagement()} {activeTab === 'reports' && renderReports()}
); }; export default FnbDashboard;
